_header: Depart thy goods while thou hast time
Subjects: transitoriness, of world; friendship; friends, fickleness of
_description: On the impermanence of goods and friendship — two cross-rhymed quatrains

TCD211.Transcription:
Depart þi godes wyll þu hast timeAnd trust þu not to
                    fayre byhestWhyl þu art here þi godes byn þyneWhen
                    þu art ded þy part if leftWhyl þu lyuest þy fryndus
                    lyuunand when þu dyest þey dyen alsoWhen þu art ded
                    & mast not gyuunÞen is þy frenschyp all ago
TCD211.Note: Added at end of volume by a fifteenth-century hand.
